name: DEFECT 5
description:
Controls

  • A - left
  • S - right
  • W - jump
  • Space - Rewind
  • Enter - Noclip
  • 1 - low lag
  • 2 - medium lag
  • 3 - high lag

External resources:

Parallax Background: https://aethrall.itch.io/demon-woods-parallax-background
Robot Main Character: https://pink-nantis.itch.io/robot-adventurer
Mushroom, Goblin: https://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasy
Barrel and torch: https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-props-pack
Terrain: https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-platformer-world
